title: Book cover
content:

comments.content: It looks like **[Agfa Rotis Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131234/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Agfa&ffam=AgfaRotisSerif%20-%20Regular&fid=64c58677c3be9c83d0a3f318af0b2a41&fsize=60&text=die%20welt%20als%20entwurf%207%20otl%20aicher&wrap=2)** by Otl Aicher [1989]

You are right  
thank you very much!
